Author: Teppiest, Eqbot, ViviAshe, astrodoobs
Name: Snappy
Description: Want to export your character and mods exactly as-is in a single collection *without* Mare? This plugin saves and loads your character's current appearance, and allows you to share modded characters without relying on MCDF. Now with threading fixes for the latest Dalamud version!
Punchline: Plugin to save current appearance and applied mods of a character
